name: 'Kelly' Full Circle Skirt - Teal
description:
A classic cut skirt in a full circle in a lovely heavy weight satin.  Our 'Kelly' skirt is a great basic esential to any vintage glamour girl's wardrobe for her nights on the town.

The skirt has a fitted waistband with pleats at the front and back as an extra feature and is finished with a gorgeous large diamante button at the back abover the centre back zip.

Our petticoats are a perfect length to match the skirt and fluff out the skirt to give it a wonderful full look and be sure to be eye catching. Petticoats are sold seperately.

Fabric: Stretch satin

Photographed with our 'Evita' Top

A classic cut skirt in a full circle in a lovely heavy weight satin.  Our 'Kelly' skirt is a great basic esential to any vintage glamour girls wardrobe for her nights on the town.

The skirt has a fitted waistband with pleats at the front and back as an extra feature and is finished with a gorgeous large diamante button at the back abover the centre back zip.

Our petticoats are a perfect length to match the skirt and fluff out the skirt to give it a wonderful full look and be sure to be eye catching. Petticoats are sold seperately.

Fabric: Stretch satin

Photographed with our 'Evita' Top also available on our online store.

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

name: 'Gigi' Wiggle Dress - Valentine Rose
description:
Ooh La La!

'Gigi' in Valentine Rose features a contrast bust and centre front panel in a patterned rich red rose fabric.  Gorgeous flattering wide straps with pleats.  They sit similar to a cap sleeve, complete with little bra holders on the inside so they don't slip off your shoulders.  A satin bow is the finishing touch on the bust.

'Gigi' is a sexy formfitting wiggle dress that tapers down and finishes just below your knees.  A lil back split ensures you can kick up your heels and strut in ease.

Made in a great medium weight black stretch cotton with a lovely sheen.  Enough stretch to flatter you curves and enusre a great fit with comfort and sass.  

Fabric: Cotton/Spandex

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

name: 'Man Trap' Skirt - Leopard
description:
Watch out! This skirt is made for killer wiggling curves and Man Trapping!!!

Made in a gorgeous leopard printed cotton sateen with a sheen finish, perfect for kittens, reowww!  Trimmed with satin piping all around the top of the waist, front panel and curves around the hem.  4 black satin fabric double covered buttons sit above the front split.

Extra high waisted wiggle skirt that finishes a couple of inches above your natural waist line and into a sweetheart shape in the front.  This skirt is made for a firm fit on your curves and slighty tapers down where it finishes just below the knee.  Centre back invisible zipper.

Fabric: Cotton Satteen -  97% Cotton/3% Spandex

Model/MUA/Hair: Miss Molly Doll
Photo: Miss Demo Photography

name: 'Malalani' Wing Bust Dress - Tropical Paradise
description:
Inspired by one of the great designers of the 20th Century, Alfred Shaheen, whom created some of the most AMAZING outfits to come out of Hawaii.

'Malalani' is our Wing Bust Dress (similarly known as a petal bust) and features the classic eye-catching turn-down bust in a beautiful teal colour, highlighting the colour in the flowers. The bust is oh-so flattering and is created to form a great fit around your bust and hug you tightly around the torso.

In true original 50s style side back shirred panels to ensure a fabulous fit.  The 'Malalani' Dress has a very full box pleat skirt and sports side POCKETS! The bust is also fully lined and constructed in Powderpuff's usual high quality standards.

The Tropical Paradise fabric is 100% cotton and amazingly bright!  You won't be left un-noticed in a crowd in this frock

name: 'Land Ahoy' 40's Denim Jeans
description:
Wide Leg, Extra High Waisted 40's style jeans!!!

The 'Land Ahoy' Pants are a great fit, shape and lots of detailing in a cute sailor style.  An extra wide leg finished with a wide cuff, but still fitted around your hips and derriere!  Faux functioning cut-away front bib on a slimming angle up to your waist line and topped off with 6 quality red fabric covered buttons and topstitching.

An extra high waistband that sits higher than your natural waist that dips up even higher in the middle front.  The back waistband is done up by two fabric covered buttons, above the centre back zipper.  And of course, 2 pockets on your tushie which also help to keep a slimmer looking bottom!

Made in a high quality stretch indigo denim in a great medium weight, which will insure a great fit!

Fabric: Cotton/Spandex

Model/MUA/Hair: Miss Molly Doll
Photo: Miss Demo Photography

Photo 5:
Jaimie Nicole Photography
Model/MUAH: Lux St Sin

name: 'Sadie' Frock - Texas Rose
description:
A simple fun frock for sunshiny days, inspired by the dresses of the early 60s.  The 'Sadie' Frock is made in a glorious cotton fabric, printed with vintage style yellow roses.  And features the perfect completion to vintage style frocks, RicRac, which trims the neckline and hem.

Classic cut dress with a scoop neckline, gathered full skirt on the waistline which finishes on the knee and princess seams.  And cos we know what girls love, a hidden side POCKET! Straps are adjustable on a slide to ensure a great fit and have the skirt sit on your waist where it should be.  This feature is great for short or tall girls especially! Centre back zip and always with an attention to detail, a fully lined bodice.

CUTE ! CUTE ! CUTE !

Fabric: 100% Cotton

Model/MUA/Hair : Miss Molly Doll
Photo : Miss Demo Photography

Please note: straps are now singular 2cm wide, to make it easier for wearing with your bra and have one side pocket.

name: Capelet - Pink Houndstooth
description:
Lil capelet in time for the cooler months.  This mini cape is made for slipping over your favourite outfit and keeping the chills away.

Beautiful soft to touch black and pink houndstooth suiting fabric lined on the inside and under the wide collar in a silky heavy black satin.  Ties at the front in a bow with a black satin ribbon.

One size fits all.

Fabric: Poly/Viscose main.  Poly/Spandex lining.

Model/MUA/Hair: Miss Molly Doll
Photo: Miss Demo Photography

name: 'Joannie' Satin Wiggle Skirt - Lipstick
description:
'Joannie' has an extra high waist band that sits a couple of inches above your natural waistline that curves up higher at the front and is topped off with a sweet bow in the middle.  The 'Joannie' Skirt has the same great fit as our Perfect Pencil Skirts.  Finishes just below the knee and tapers down for extra wiggle in your walk!

There is a centre back zip and split at the centre back also.  Made in a gorgeous hot pink satin which is high quality ande a heavy weight.  Enough stretch to hug your pin-up curves and ensure a great flattering fit.

Photographed with our 'Evita' Top also available on the webstore.

Fabric: Polyester/Spandex

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

name: 'Kelly' Full Circle Skirt - Black Satin
description:
A classic cut skirt in a full circle in a lovely heavy weight satin.  Our 'Kelly' skirt is a great basic esential to any vintage glamour girls wardrobe for her nights on the town.

The skirt has a fitted waistband with pleats at the front and back as an extra feature and is finished with a gorgeous large diamante button at the back abover the centre back zip.

Model: Lolita Stat
Hair: Sam Night Queen

name: 'Perfect Pencil' Skirt - Lipstick
description:
Powderpuff believes that their pencil skirt, is the 'Perfect Pencil Skirt' shape.  This skirt starts at waist height and slightly tapers at the sides, finishing just below the knee.  Above the back split, a satin bow is a sweet touch to finish off this skirt.

Made in a great medium weight cotton blend fabric, with a lovely sheen and just enough stretch to hug those sexy pin-up curves.  
 
The must have wardrobe basic for all vintage kittens!

Fabric : Cotton/Spandex

Photographed with our 'Evita' Top also available on our online store.

Model: Mademoiselle Le Neveu 
2nd Model: Lux St Sin Photo: Jamie Nicole

name: 'Lucille' Frock - Linen Rose
description:
Named after Powderpuff's favourite song by Little Richard, Lucille!

This full circle 50s inspired dress will have stepping out looking like a Stepford Wife, ready for high teas with the ladies, shopping in style or attending a Summer time wedding.  

Wear with our without a petticoat, this fully lined dress sits beautifully either way.  Looks fabulous dressed up, or the linen fabric, lined in a light cotton voile makes it a perfect breezy Summer dress.

Beautiful pastel linen and cotton fabric with large traditional roses, set-off by the rouched bust in a matching soft pink.  The wide straps pleat where they meet the dress and cap the arm as they sit just off to the shoulder edge.  Lil bra keepers on the straps mean they won't slip off your shoulders.  Centre back invisible zip.

Petticoat sold separately.

ONE SIZE 14  WITH BLUE BUST ON SALE!!!

Fabric : Main Linen/Cotton. Lining Cotton voile

name: 'Varla' Capris - Black
description:
Move over Peggy Bundy, there's some new capris in town to turn every female into a bad girl!

NEW 'Varla' Capris at Powderpuff aptly named after one of the badest gals ever to grace the silverscreen.  These Capris are all about summonsing your inner vixen, showing off your killer curves and showcasing your derriere.

'Varla' Capris are an AMAZING fit and look fantabulous on many different ladies of different shapes and sizes.  High to the waist line like all vintage styled peddle pushers should be, then with an extra high waistband and two buttons above the centre back lap zipper.  A centre seam runs down the back of the legs for a slimming look and with a little split at the bottom.

Capris are a must have for every 50s pin-up girl and a great basic to have in your wardrobe from your day to night outfits.  Available from Powderpuff in black, denim, leopard and more colours coming soon!  All with stretch for a great figure hugging fit.

Fabric : Stretch Bengaline

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

name: 'Varla' Capris - Denim
description:

name: 'Audrey' Wiggle Dress - Black
description:
Fab wiggle dress for vintage loving bombshells whom love to strut their stuff and show off their best assets!  The 'Audrey' dress in black is a classic lil number that can be dressed up for a night on the town or a sassy dres suitable for the office.  For a touch of extra glamour, this version of the 'Audrey' is finished with shinny black satin cuffs and collar and ties with a black satin ribbon.

Featuring a sexy peekaboo neckline that flatters your bust and with the neck high tie-up collar it creates a 'naughty but nice' look.  3/4 length sleeves are finished with rounded cuffs that match the curves of the peter pan collar.  Fitted wiggle skirt tapers towards and finishes just bellow the knees. 

From below the collar to below the waist is an invisible zipper in the centre back.

This dress would look great teamed with your favourite belt!

Made in a great medium weight sateen with a lil sheen to it and enough stretch to hug your curves in comfort.

Fabric: Cotton/Elastane (satin cuffs and collar)

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

name: 'Joannie' Wiggle Skirt - Leopard
description:
'Joannie' has an extra high waist band that sits a couple of inches above your natural waistline that curves up higher at the front and is topped off with a sweet bow in the middle.  The 'Joannie' Skirt has the same great fit as our Perfect Pencil Skirts.  Finishes just below the knee and tapers down for extra wiggle in your walk!

There is a centre back zip and split at the centre back also.  Made from a high quality medium weight stretch cotton that has a lovely sheen to it.  Enough stretch to hug your pin-up curves and ensure a great flattering fit.

name: 'Hello Buoys' Wiggle Dress - Navy
description:
'Hello Buoys' wiggle dress is a great fitting halter dress inspired by vintage sailorettes.

The 'Hello Buoys' dress features a turn over top in contrast colour with a quality fabirc covered button on each side.  It has contrast pleat panel in the back split with two buttons above.  Around the hem is a double line of satin ribbon trim.

The 'Hello Buoys' dress has a figure hugging fit and slightly tapers at the sides, finishing just below the knee.  Made in a great medium weight cotton blend fabric, with a lovely sheen and just enough stretch to hug those sexy pin-up curves!

Perfect for all Rockabilly gals!

Fabric - Cotton/Spandex

Girlie Show Photography
Model: Angie Alamillia

description:

The 'Hello Buoys' dress features a turn over top in contrast colour with a quality fabirc covered button on each side.  It has contrast pleat panel in the back split with two buttons above.  Around the hem is a double line of satin ribbon trim.

name: 'Peekaboo' Top - Black
description:
Powderpuff's 'Peekaboo' Top is perfect for the cooler months in it's comfy snug fabric and 3/4 length sleeves.  It features a sweetheart style neckline that comes up into a standup mandarin collar.  It's finished with satin ribbon that ties in a bow.

Perfect length to wear over jeans for a more casual look or tuck it into your favourite waist high skirt or with our 'Perfect Pencil' Skirt or 'Kelly' Skirt for a glamourous evening style.

Made in a lovely soft heavy weight stretch Ponte Di Roma

Model: Miss Molly Doll

name: 'Varla' Cigarette Pants - Denim
description:
NEW 'Varla' Cigarette Pants at Powderpuff aptly named after one of the badest gals ever to grace the silverscreen.  These pants are all about summonsing your inner vixen, showing off your killer curves and showcasing your derriere.

'Varla' Cigarette Pants are an AMAZING fit and look fantabulous on many different ladies of different shapes and sizes.  High to the waist line like all vintage styled peddle pushers should be, then with an extra high waistband and two buttons above the centre back zipper.  A centre seam runs down the back of the legs for a slimming look and with a little split at the bottom.

Made in a beautiful quality medium weight stretch denim.  This denim is smooth to touch and feels amazing to wear.

Fabric : Cotton/lycra

Model/MUA/Hair: Miss Molly Doll
Photo: Miss Demo Photography

name: 'Starlet' Wiggle Dress - Leopard
description:
This dress was definitely made to bring out your inner bombshell with it's plunging neck line and back finished with a luxurious oversized velvet bow.

The 'Starlet' dress is made for gals who know how to strut their stuff and the gorgeous high quality Leopard sateen fabric will hug your curves in all the right places.  The neck line plunges at the front and crosses over itself to the empire line which creates a panel to the waist line, trimmed in a baby pink sateen.  The back of the dress is cut low in a 'V' and below sits an oversized plush bow in high quality black velvet.  This luxurious dress finishes just below the knee in true 1950s wiggle dress fashion.  The 'Starlet' dress has a lined bodice and side zipper.

This Leopard fabric is a great weight with a sheen to it and enough stretch for a great fit.  The tones of the brown print makes it team perfectly with baby pinks in your wardrobe. Purrfect!

Fabric : 95% Cotton/ 5% Spandex

Photo: Paperdoll PinUps
Photography : Sonya Carthy
Make Up/Hair : www.jenrossiter.com.au
Model : Bunni Lambada

name: 'Evita' Top - Black
description:
Our 'Evita' is by far the most flattering top.  It can be worn two ways, as a halter top or crossed at the front and tied around your neck.  The 'Evita' gives you a true vintage hollywood glamour look.  The straps gather from the side of the bust and cover the sides of your arms in the most complimentary way to flatter a women's figure.

Available in a selection of plain colours to team with your favourite outfits.  There is enough length in the Evita Top to wear it over jeans for a casual look or tucked into your favourite skirt, pants or shorts.

Made is the same stretch cotton sateen fabric as our Perfect Pencil Skirts.  Wear them together with or without a belt and you will achieve the look of a dress with two seperates.

Fabric : Cotton/Spandex

Model/MUA/Hair: Miss Molly Doll
Photo: Miss Demo Photography

name: 'Peekaboo Pussycat' Top - Leopard
description:
Powderpuff's 'Peekaboo' Top is perfect for the cooler months or great for evening wear during the warmer months when you'd normally wear a lil cardigan... Made in a gorgeous soft comfy snug fabric that's a medium weight and with 3/4 length sleeves, it's guaranteed to keep you warm whilst you look like a smokin' hot kitty!  It features a sweetheart style neckline that comes up into a standup mandarin collar.  This purrrrrfect top is finished with a lush velvet ribbon that ties into a bow.

Perfect length to wear over jeans for a more casual look or tuck it into your favourite waist high skirt or with our 'Perfect Pencil' Skirt or 'Kelly' Skirt for a glamourous evening style.

Fabric: Stretch printed Ponte Di Roma

More photos to come! Check out the images of Miss Molly Doll wearing the 'Peekaboo' Top to see the awesome fit of this top in the meantime.

Photo 2: Candice DeVille www.superkawaiimama.com.au

name: 'Polly Picnic' Skirted Playsuit - Red Gingham
description:
Perfect for picnics, riding your beach cruiser or frolicking on a sunny day is the 'Polly Picnic' Playsuit with a full circle skirt over the li shorties!

A great lil 50s style piece in classic gingham and ric rac trimming the skirt.  A tie front bust feature and adjustable straps to fit the length of your torso, that tie to bows on your shoulders.  The shorties underneath are fitted and there is a centre back zip in this lil romper.

Cute! Cute! Cute!

Fabric: Poly/Cotton

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

name: 'Chicklet' Playsuit - Cherry
description:
Your tushie will be in everyone's sights in this lil number!!!
Another CUTE playsuit that is simply ador-a-bubble!

The 'Chicklet' Playsuit has a sweet bust that is rouched with lil red satin bows below the halter straps.  This suit has a fitted bodice and shorts, but the main feature on this suit is the 3 rows of ruffles across the tushie in red!

Made in 100% cotton and in the same high quality as all of our garments.

Photo: Paperdoll PinUps
Photography : Sonya Carthy

name: 'Gidget' Playsuit - Red Polkadot
description:
The Gidget' Playsuit is a great lil 50's inspired outfit perfect for every minx.  Wear it shopping, pool parties, car shows or frolicking at the beach and you're sure to look like a cutie pie.

'Gidget Playsuit' features a pleated bust, a shirred back to ensure a perfect fit and a frilled trim at the short's bottom. The bodice is fully lined.

Made from 100% Cotton

name: 'Flirtini' Cocktail Dress - Black Satin
description:
Anyone for cocktails?

Our 'Flirtini' Dress makes a gal ready for any party! The Flirtini Frock has a full circle skirt and a fitted bodice with a flattering twist bust.  The wide gathered straps cap the top of your arms and have bra strap holders to make sure they don't slip off your shoulders.  Always with attention to detail, with a fully lined bodice.

Made in a gorgeous heavy stretch satin, this dress is perfect for wowing a crowd at your special occasion. 

Photographed with one of our gorgeous petticoats, sold separately.

Fabric : Stretch Poly Satin

Model/MUA/Hair: Miss Molly Doll
Photo: Miss Demo Photography

name: Signature Powderpuff Singlet - Black
description:
Powderpuff's signature pin-up girl is now available on a singlet for you to wear our cute brand.  Printed on a great cut stretch black singlet in metallic gold and white.  The scoop neck is finished with a lush lil velvet bow.

Easy to wear over jeans or tuck into your favourite high waisted skirt.  

Fabric: Cotton/Elastane

Designed by DirtyFlair and printed by FTM TShirts, both Adelaide companies.

*please note; singlets are not made in Australia like all of the Powderpuff garments

name: Powderpuff Signature Singlet - White
description:
Powderpuff's signature pin-up girl is now available on a singlet for you to wear our cute brand.  Printed on a great cut stretch white singlet in Powderpuff's logo colours of teal and purple with lil metallic gold stars to highlight.  The scoop neck is finished with a lush lil velvet bow in teal.

name: 'Sweet Wahine' Playsuit - Yellow Hibiscus
description:
Aloha!  

Sweet Wahine features a real bamboo buckle at the front that the bust gathers and pleats through.  A faux wrap front over the front of the shorts that has a glamourous waterfall edge with a red underside that picks up the colours in the hibiscus flowers.  The straps tie over the sholders to help to ensure the playsuit fits your length properly.

Sunshiny yellow fabric that will have you ready to be the party gal at any luau!

Fabric: 100% Cotton

LAST SIZES LISTED!

NORMALLY $130 !

name: 'Hello Buoys' Playsuit -Red
description:
Inspired by our popular Hello Buoys Dress, we have redesigned it into a cute lil sailor time playsuit!

Featuring the same contrast turn-downs at the bust with lil fabric covered buttons and made in the same great high quality medium weight stretch cotton sateen.  This playsuit has been made into two colour combos, red and white and also navy and white.  

Embroidered on the tushie is a sweet white anchor design, which will catch the eye of any admirer.  The Hello Buoys Playsuits also come with a white belt to complete the look.  The straps are adjustable with buttons inside to ensure it is the correct length for your torso and guarantee a comfy fit. 

Fabric: Cotton/Spandex

Photo:Gold Coast Pinup Photography
Model : Mademoiselle Le Neveu
Hair : Sam Night Queen

Photo 2 : Jaimie Nicole Photography
Model : Jessie Lee

name: 'Hello Buoys' Playsuit -Navy
description:
Inspired by our popular Hello Buoys Dress, we have redesigned it into a cute lil sailor time playsuit!

Featuring the same contrast turn-downs at the bust with lil buttons and made in the same great high quality medium weight stretch cotton sateen.  This playsuit has been made into two colour combos, red and white and also navy and white.  

Embroidered on the tushie is a sweet white anchor design, which will catch the eye of any admirer.  The Hello Buoys Playsuits also come with a white belt to complete the look.  The straps are adjustable with buttons inside to ensure it is the correct length for your torso and guarantee a comfy fit. 

Fabric: Cotton/Spandex

Styling H/MU: Jennifer Rossiter

Photo 3, 4 & 5
Model : Lolita Starr & Mademoiselle Le Neveu
Hair : Sam Night Queen

name: 'Leilana' Playsuit - Frangipani
description:
This Hawaiian themed playsuit with bamboo bust detail just screams Summer fun!

The tropical print fabric is gorgeous with white frangipani flowers and the bright green leaves on the vibrant pink background.  This is the playsuit to make you stand out at any luau or pool party. 

This playsuit has tie straps to adjust to the length of your torso and the lil shorties are cuffed at the hem. Tuck pleats are on the waistline at the front and back.  The feature of this suit of course the real bamboo hoop that the bust gathers through.  Slip in and out of this cute lil number through the centre back zip. 

Fabric: 100% cotton

Model/MUA/Hair : Miss Molly Doll
Photo: Miss Demo Photography

LAST SIZES LISTED!

description:

The tropical print fabric with red hibiscus flower, makes it perfect for any luau or pool party.

name: 'Perfect Pencil' Skirt - Black
description:
Powderpuff believes that their pencil skirt, is the 'Perfect Pencil Skirt' shape.  This skirt starts at waist height and slightly tapers at the sides, finishing just below the knee.  Above the back split, a satin bow is a sweet touch to finish off this skirt.

Made in a great medium weight cotton blend fabric, with a lovely sheen and just enough stretch to hug those sexy pin-up curves.  
 
The must have wardrobe basic for all vintage kittens!

Fabric : Cotton/Spandex

Photographed with our 'Evita' Top also available on our online store.

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

description:

name: 'Evita' Top - White
description:
Our 'Evita' is by far the most flattering top.  It can be worn two ways, as a halter top or crossed at the front and tied around your neck.  The 'Evita' gives you a true vintage hollywood glamour look.  The straps gather from the side of the bust and cover the sides of your arms in the most complimentary way to flatter a women's figure.

Available in a selection of plain colours to team with your favourite outfits.  There is enough length in the Evita Top to wear it over jeans for a casual look or tucked into your favourite skirt, pants or shorts.

Made is the same stretch cotton sateen fabric as our Perfect Pencil Skirts.  Wear them together with or without a belt and you will achieve the look of a dress with two seperates.

Fabric : Cotton/Spandex

Photo: Paperdoll PinUps
Photography : Sonya Carthy
Make Up/Hair : www.jenrossiter.com.au
Model : Bunni Lambada

name: 'Lorelei' Top - Black
description:
'Lorelei' is a great basic top that is comfy and looks hot. The cut of the neckline and tie front makes it the most flattering top for showing off a girls best assetts! The 'Lorelei' is a great casual top for over jeans or tucked into your waist high skirts.

Made from cotton/lycra, this stretchy fabric will give you a great fit and is a great quality fabric.

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

name: 'Gigi' Top - Valentine Rose
description:
Normally $79 !

Ooh La La!

'Gigi' in Valentine Rose features a contrast bust and centre front panel in a patterned rich red rose fabric.  Gorgeous flattering wide straps with pleats complete with little bra holders on the inside so they don't slip off your shoulders.  A satin bow is the finishing touch on the bust.

Wear it over pants or jeans or tuck it into your favourite waist high skirt.  Photographed with our Perfect Pencil Skirt also available on the webstore.

Made in a great medium weight black stretch cotton with a lovely sheen.  Enough stretch to flatter you curves and enusre a great fit.  

Fabric: Cotton/Spandex

Photo: Etch Studio
Model/Hair/MU: Miss Molly Doll

LAST SIZES LISTED!

name: 'Flirtini' Cocktail Dress - Blue Roses
description:
Anyone for cocktails?

Our 'Flirtini' Dress makes a gal ready for any party! The Flirtini Frock has a full circle skirt and a fitted bodice with a flattering twist bust.  The wide gathered straps cap the top of your arms and have bra strap holders to make sure they don't slip off your shoulders.  Always with attention to detail, with a fully lined bodice.

Made in a gorgeous stretch satin in blue roses.  This dress is perfect for dressing up for a special occasion or for a high tea date with the ladies.

Photographed with one of our gorgeous petticoats, sold seperately.

Fabric : Stretch Poly Satin

Model/MUA/Hair: Miss Molly Doll
Photo: Miss Demo Photography

name: 'Hello Buoys' Pencil Skirt - Navy
description:
'Hello Buoys' pencil skirt is a great fitting skirt inspired by vintage sailorettes.

The 'Hello Buoys' skirt features, a bib front with 6 quality fabric covered buttons and a contrast pleat panel in the back split with two buttons above.  Around the hem is a double line of satin ribbon trim.

The 'Hello Buoys' skirt is the perfect pencil skirt shape, starting at waist hight, with slightly tapering sides, finishing just below the knee.  Made in a great medium weight cotton blend fabric, with a lovely sheen and just enough stretch to hug those sexy pin-up curves!

Perfect for all Rockabilly gals!

Fabric - Cotton/Spandex

Pictured with our 'Evita' Top also available on our webstore!

Photo: Paperdoll PinUps
Photography : Sonya Carthy
Make Up/Hair : www.jenrossiter.com.au
Model : Bunni Lambada

name: 'Luxurious Stole' - Faux Fur
description:
Every hollywood starlet needs a faux fur stole in their wardrobe to put over their favourite dress in the cooler weather!  Our stoles are made with the finest, softest faux fur and lined in satin.  Tie the long satin sashes in a bow or a long hanging knot.  

Our stoles can be worn several ways...tied at the front, at the back, twisting through the arms, or at the side over one shoulder

These stoles are the finishing touch of elegance to your outfit and sit so comfortably and won't slip off your shoulders.

Photographed with our 'Kelly' Skirt and 'Evita' Top.

Model: Lolita Star
Hair: Sam Night Queen

name: 'Hello Buoys' Shorties - Baby Pink
description:
Cute as Pie on the High Seas!!!

Waist high sailorette style shorts with a button bib at the front, complete with 6 high quality contrast fabric covered buttons.  These great lil shorts are a close fit around the waist and hips and flare just a lil bit around the tops of your legs.  Finished with a turn up cuff and buttons on the outside legs and lil faux pocket flaps on the back as an extra feature.

Made in a great medium weight stretch cotton for a great fit and comfort.  

Girlie Show Photography
Model: Angie Alamillia

name: Petticoat - White
description:
FRILLY, FULL AND FUN!!!  

These gorgeous petticoats are from one of the leading companies in the US whom have been making these wonderful undergarments for over 50 years.

Made from many metres of super soft fairy floss tulle, these petticoats are sure to turn heads! They give a fabulous silhouette with there EXTRA full shape and demand attention on the dancefloor or when out shopping in style.

Finished with rows of cute frills that cheekily pop out of the bottom of our Sumer Roses Frocks, these are the perfect undergarment to complete your 1950s look.  

BUT dont just keep them covered up! Wear a half slip underneath our petticoats and you've also got yourself a brand new skirt!

Length: 55cm

name: Gift Certificate $50
description:
Know a special lady would love one of our garments, but not 100% sure which one to choose?  Gift Certificates are now available for you to give as a present to your loved ones! 

We can send it to you or simply change the postal address and to whom you want it sent to at the checkout and we'll arrange it for you!  Stylish gift certificate, sent in a pretty envelope.

Valid for one year from purchase date.

Please Note: Certificates purchased at sale price will not be valid on sale items or special offers in the future.
